featured.text: As one swapper puts it, “Nobody is going to fly across the ocean or drive 600 miles to come steal your TV.
The thief went into the apartment building and stole some jewelry.

definition.zh_def: 偷竊，非法取得他人財物。
definition.en_def: To take someone else's property without permission or legal right.
definition.example: He decided to steal a bicycle from the park.
